comment.body: That's insane, the generator must be 20 years old and is still more efficient than a Volvo diesel engine. However, one also need to take into account the additional pollution/emissions caused by manufacturing of the battery for the Tesla. The energy consumed during manufacturing can be equal to several years of energy consumption during normal use of the Tesla.
The problem with modern electric vehicles is that it is very difficult to tap into it's batteries, so it's not really possible to use them for lighting, a coffee maker, or to charge a laptop...
Did user data get filled to the limit on your old account?
Yeah, considering you could get OnePlus One in 2015 with 64 GB storage for only $299. Feels like these days only price and physical size is increasing, the specs stay the same.
What would be the benefit of banning the Chinese bots? Do they cause spamming or anything?
